name: Nexus Series Diamond RO System with Zinc, Copper, and Alkaline Technology

technologiesIncluded: RO (Reverse Osmosis): Removes impurities and contaminants
UF (Ultrafiltration): Filters out finer particles and pathogens
TDS (Total Dissolved Solids) Control: Adjusts the TDS level of the water
Alkaline: Adds essential minerals and balances the pH level
specifications.design: Elegant black with gold accents and a user-friendly tap

benefits: Zinc and Copper Enrichment: Zinc boosts immunity and aids in metabolism, while copper supports cardiovascular health and has antimicrobial properties.
Alkaline Water: Balances the body's pH level and provides essential minerals for better health.
Comprehensive Filtration: RO removes dissolved impurities, UV ensures microbiologically safe water, UF further purifies water, and TDS control retains essential minerals.
Next Generation Technology: Advanced filtration processes ensure high-quality and safe drinking water.
User-Friendly: Easy to operate, with an aesthetic design that complements modern kitchens and offices.
description: The Nexus Series Diamond RO System combines advanced filtration technologies with Zinc, Copper, and Alkaline enrichment to deliver pure, healthy, and mineral-rich water. Its elegant design and user-friendly features make it an ideal choice for modern homes and offices.
